pat_meta: select json_object_agg(col,data) from  ((select 'district' as col,json_agg(row_to_json(d))::jsonb as data from (select grade from periodic_grade_district group by grade)as d) union (select 'block' as col,json_agg(row_to_json(d))::jsonb as data from (select grade from periodic_grade_block group by grade)as d) union (select 'cluster' as col,json_agg(row_to_json(d))::jsonb as data from (select grade from periodic_grade_cluster group by grade)as d) union (select 'school' as col,json_agg(row_to_json(d))::jsonb as data from (select grade from periodic_grade_school group by grade)as d))as d
